settings.heading: Harnessing the Dual Power of Hemp & Dead Sea Salt for Revolutionary Oral Health
settings.subheading: At STOP Oral Care, we believe in the fusion of nature's wonders with cutting-edge research. Under the visionary leadership of Dr. Veronica Stahl, we're setting new benchmarks in oral care by tapping into the unmatched benefits of hemp and the distinctive healing minerals of the Dead Sea.

settings.heading: Hemp: Nature's Microbial Maestro
settings.subheading: Central to our line of products is the dynamic hemp molecule. This potent natural agent stands out for its unique ability to disrupt interbacterial communication. By halting this bacterial chatter, hemp effectively deactivates harmful bacteria, safeguarding the oral environment from potential threats.

settings.heading: Dead Sea Salt: Nature's Healing Elixir
settings.subheading: But the uniqueness of our approach truly shines with the inclusion of Dead Sea salt. Unlike any other salt on Earth, the Dead Sea variety boasts a rich mineral content, encompassing essential nutrients known for their therapeutic properties. These minerals not only enhance the antimicrobial action of hemp but also promote healing and rejuvenation in the oral cavity. It's a holistic approach where protection meets regeneration.

settings.heading: Innovative and Uncompromising
settings.subheading: Each product at STOP is a testament to our dedication to quality and efficacy. We combine the innate wisdom of nature with rigorous scientific scrutiny, ensuring a dental experience that’s not only soothing but also potent against oral challenges.

settings.heading: Redefining Oral Care
settings.subheading: Guided by Dr. Stahl's commitment to excellence and innovation, STOP Oral Care is pioneering a transformative journey in oral health. Dive into a regimen powered by the unparalleled synergy of hemp and Dead Sea minerals, and embrace a smile that’s a naturally vibrant as it is healthy.

custom_css: .content-container {border-radius: 20px; background-color: white; display: block; height: 100% !important; padding: 10% 10% 10% 10%;}

settings.custom_liquid:
<style>
#Slider-template--20837676974387__ee84acdf-ba27-40ad-a4d4-68e5464cfc11 .grid--1-col {
  width: calc(
    33.333% - var(--desktop-margin-left-first-item) -
      var(--grid-desktop-horizontal-spacing) * 2
  );
 
}
#Slider-template--20837676974387__ee84acdf-ba27-40ad-a4d4-68e5464cfc11 .slider__slide .scroll-trigger .animate--slide-in {
  visibility: visible !important;
}

.scroll-trigger .animate--slide-in {
 animation: example1 25s linear infinite;
}
@-moz-keyframes example1 {
  70%   { -moz-transform: translateX(100%); }
  100% { -moz-transform: translateX(-100%); }
}
@-webkit-keyframes example1 {
  0%   { -webkit-transform: translateX(100%); }
  100% { -webkit-transform: translateX(-100%); }
}
@keyframes example1 {
  0%   {
    -moz-transform: translateX(100%); /* Firefox bug fix */
    -webkit-transform: translateX(100%); /* Firefox bug fix */
    transform: translateX(100%);
  }
  100% {
    -moz-transform: translateX(-100%); /* Firefox bug fix */
    -webkit-transform: translateX(-100%); /* Firefox bug fix */
    transform: translateX(-100%);
  }
}




</style>
